sentence: Last Thursday, just weeks after the RNC's resolution against Cheney and Kinzinger, House Republican Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy endorsed Cheney's primary challenger in Wyoming, trial attorney Harriet Hageman.
author: Robert Costa
title: Trump's GOP critics to gather in Washington with an eye on 2024 presidential race
